nodes.text: The Baxel sector, also known as the Baxel oversector, was a sector located within the Outer Rim Territories that crossed over to Wild Space, with a border connected to Hutt Space. Its capital was Teth in the Teth system, which was located at the outer border of the Outer Rim Territories.
During the last centuries of the Old Republic, the region was located in the Hutt Space.
The Baxel sector was created from freestanding subsectors by the Empire which made Teth its capital.

During the Imperial era, the sector was governed by Moff Sarn Shild up to 4 BBY and by Moff Heedra during the Galactic Civil War, who worked hard to drive the Hutts from the planets they controlled within his territory, including Lirra.
At the time of the Second Imperial Civil War, the sector was part of the Hutt dependencies but remained under influence of the Galactic Alliance Remnant.
